API Template

A simple Flask Python API enabled with header authentication. This template is typically used to enable new Python application to quickly expose business logic.

Investment Portfolio App

A backend Investment Portfolio application that allows the users to manually add Certificate of Deposit and Stock information to generate monthly CSV reports. These reports displays the amount of money earn during the specified year.

Slackbot Template

This Slackbot template application allows users to quickly setup a Events API Slackbot to automate all kinds of mundane tasks.

Docker Content Management

Utilizing Docker, this repository allows developers the setup barebones or imported WordPress or Drupal projects for freelance web developer or just to play around with a new Content Managment System.
